title: Question:
author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
content: Good day, folks,A lot of people here love football ‚öΩ üèà, betting and Gambling. The purpose of this thread is to discuss every sports event that you are interested in, gambling, betting odds, and predictions. but particularly premier league is what every body loves.¬†No hate, but if you guys want to make public the name of the club you support, you can mention your club on the thread, and I will update it here. When you do so, please mention me at @Dr.Bitcoin_Strange.¬†Discuss your club, fixture, and derby, and let's have fun.

comments.author: Zaguru12
comments.body: He no bad say we get football discussion here oo and na beta thing you do wey u bring am up but the EPL mata na him no go well with me. Since the official page get EPL thread and na still English dem they yarn there which I know say everybody here understand. Engaging in the discussion there and also saying almost similar thing here looks like spamming to me. The best thing na to discuss only Naija league for here and my mind bin Dey tell me say dem don create that thread before but I no fit find am, so if he no Dey again we for use this one for NPFL talk but no be any European football matter

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Quote from: Zaguru12 on January 27, 2023, 04:43:23 PMso if he no Dey again we for use this one for NPFL talk but no be any European football matter¬†Ok, you have a good point, bro. I have not come across any sports threads on this, even when I searched. Since we have the EPL where it is, we can revert this thread to NPFL, or it could just be a general sports thread. What do others think?ü•Ç?

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Quote from: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange on January 27, 2023, 04:59:47 PMwe can revert this thread to NPFL, or it could just be a general sports thread. What do others think?ü•Ç?We already have an existing NPFL thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5431261.msg61492124#msg61492124
